text: con i use if statement with deal properties? or can i use if statements to show dinamic content (from deal) in an email module?

I recently designed and coded an email for a client which featured a large banner with their logo embedded. On top of this, it swaps out responsively to a mobile formatted version with the same image and logo embedded. Part of the brief was to ensure it was 100% accessible so it could be read by all their customers.

I wrote a short article on how I achieved this and it highlights how a custom coded email can help you stand out from your competition by accommodating every reader, something many drag and drop editors struggle with.
